attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In March 2002, the Republic of Ireland introduced a tax on plastic shopping bags, a 'plastax'. While Irelands move has reduced plastic bags by 90% and brought millions in revenue for the Irish government, I say take it one step further - a total ban on plastic shopping bags.
The impact has obvious environmental benefits, including reduced litter, less for land-fill and fewer obstructions in drainage and sewage systems.
Thanks for reading.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "ban plastic shopping bags."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13422.asp

Prime Minister's Office
